title: BOTS EVERYWHERE!!!!
body: So I have been playing a lot lately and found that there are an alarming amount of bots now playing aram on the oce servers. It started with a few here and there but the last game i was in was me teamed with 4 bots. being as i rerolled my character, sorry wasted my reroll for a game full of bots, i decided it was time to raise the point. So is anyone else experiencing this? Has RIOT addressed the issue with plans to bring in a report for botting option? I would love to continue to play but if it comes down to me being paired with bots 9/10 games then why would anyone want to continue playing? Any feedback would be great!

replies.body: lol i've never seen a bot in aram
